tool_description: Quickly determine the authenticity of your data with just a single API call. This powerful tool allows you to analyze text and ascertain whether it was generated by a machine or a human. It is ideal for businesses, researchers, and developers who need to verify the authenticity of various text types, including customer reviews and social media posts.

api_list.name: Check text
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to submit text for analysis to determine if it was generated by a machine or a human. Please avoid using any special characters, as they may cause the request to fail. Note that results become reliable after analyzing around 50 tokens.

required_parameters.name: term
required_parameters.description: The text you suspect may be generated by AI.
required_parameters.default: Text you think is generated by AI
